title: A letter to the President from State Minister Lansa
content: State Minister Nimal Lansa, who is currently refraining from Ministerial duties is scheduled to send a letter to the President today.He confirmed this to our news team and he said he is hoping to brief the President on the reasons for leaving the ministry and the future course of action.He is also scheduled to make a statement in Parliament today regarding the reasons.Joining the adjournment debate in Parliament yesterday, she said that the Secretary to the Ministry of Health had informed her about it.
